title: A Helpful Daughter
story: Can you give me a hand, Nancy? Sure, dad. What can I do? I need to change a tire. Okay. I'd love to help. Hand me that tool, dear. Here it is, dad. You are a good helper. Thanks, dad.
summary: A young girl named Nancy helps her dad change a tire and receives praise for being a good helper.
image: An image of a young girl handing a tool to her dad while he changes a tire.
